column4: has anyone walked into their local apple store lately? have you seen those lovely huge cinema displays they just released?
i mean these screens were huge... i was so amazed
those big 22" flatscreens? Very sweet looking. $$$$$$, tho
it's spelled "Hoary", actually... :)
they're running Windows? :)
point out that OO is free?
athlon xp, athlon xp.... Athlon XP!!!
those are very nice chips. I'm using an XP-M right now. not all "XP" branded stuff is junk...
im planning to get a linux box for around $300, im sure you're familar with the XP-M chips.. what shall i get?
where are you at?
$300 USD? See if you can't find a 2500+.
Canada. BC.
do those XP-M's still have unlocked multipliers?
AFAIK, yes. my OC's quite happily. 1.8 stock, currently running at 2.0
I think it was the regular XP CPUs that got locked
XPM are actually laptop CPUs by design, they can't be locked (power conservation)
yep.. as for memory, im not doing anything really productive.. do you think 512mb is enough?
can you squeeze 1Gb out of your budget?
/msg me, this is getting off topic
Ubuntu seems quite happy to play in a 1Gb box! XP too...
install firestarter if you want
Linux is smarter than Windows
was about to point that out to you... ;)
